<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/fp-connector/api/v1/upload-asset-based-fees-schedule"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to upload an asset-based fees schedule to First Pension's System.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"assetBasedFees":{"description":"An array of asset-based fee objects, each containing","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Amount":{"description":"The amount of the fee","type":"string","example":"768013.54"},"BeneficiaryName":{"description":"he name of the beneficiary","type":"string","example":"Crusader Sterling Pensions"},"CreditAccountNo":{"description":"The account number to which the amount will be credited","type":"string","example":"1222813687"},"CreditBankCode":{"description":"The bank code for the credit account","type":"string","example":"232"},"DebitAccountNo":{"description":"The account number from which the amount will be debited","type":"string","example":"1222814543"},"DebitBankCode":{"description":"The bank code for the debit account","type":"string","example":"11"},"Naration":{"description":"A narration or description of the transaction","type":"string","example":"CPL RSA Fund I Asset B-Fees APR 23"},"OrgtranParticular":{"description":"The particulars of the organization transaction","type":"string","example":"32"},"PaymentDate":{"description":"The date of payment","type":"string","format":"date","example":"5/30/2023"},"orgtranrefno":{"description":"The reference number of the organization transaction","type":"string","example":"CPL"},"penComApproval":{"description":"The approval status from PenCom","type":"string","example":"Approved"},"serialNum":{"description":"The serial number of the fee entry","type":"string","example":"1"}}},"example":[{"Amount":"768013.54","BeneficiaryName":"Crusader Sterling Pensions","CreditAccountNo":"1222813687","CreditBankCode":"232","DebitAccountNo":"1222814543","DebitBankCode":"11","Naration":"CPL RSA Fund I Asset B-Fees APR 23","OrgtranParticular":"32","PaymentDate":"5/30/2023","orgtranrefno":"CPL","penComApproval":"Approved","serialNum":"1"},{"Amount":"102401.8","BeneficiaryName":"First Pension Custodian Ltd","CreditAccountNo":"1222813687\"","CreditBankCode":"11","DebitAccountNo":"1222814543","DebitBankCode":"11","Naration":"CPL RSA Fund I Asset B-Fees APR 23","OrgtranParticular":"32","PaymentDate":"5/30/2023","orgtranrefno":"CPL","penComApproval":"Approved","serialNum":"2"}]},"scheduleCode":{"description":"The code representing the schedule","type":"string","example":"SC-001"}}},"examples":{"Upload Asset Based Fees Schedule":{"value":{"assetBasedFees":[{"Amount":"768013.54","BeneficiaryName":"Crusader Sterling Pensions","CreditAccountNo":"1222813687","CreditBankCode":"232","DebitAccountNo":"1222814543","DebitBankCode":"11","Naration":"CPL RSA Fund I Asset B-Fees APR Ltd","CreditAccountNo":"1222813687","CreditBankCode":"11","DebitAccountNo":"1222814543","DebitBankCode":"11","Naration":"CPL RSA Fund I Asset B-Fees APR 23","OrgtranParticular":"32","PaymentDate":"5/30/2023","orgtranrefno":"CPL","penComApproval":"Approved","serialNum":"2"}],"scheduleCode":"SC-001"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
